creditline: Gift of John and Myrtle Coe

medium: Watercolor, gouache, and graphite on paper
provenance: [The Downtown Gallery, New York; sold May 1951, for $150, to Kaydon]; Herbert J. Kaydon, Dobbs Ferry, New York, from 1951. [The Downtown Gallery, New York, (Inv. no. 182), sold Nov. 17, 1964 to Hillstrom]; Richard Lewis Hillstrom, St. Paul, Minn. (Inv. no. RLH 201); sold privately to Coe; John I. Coe, Bloomington, Minn. until 1998; given to MIA, 1998.
title: Tennis Umbrella
